/usr/local/cuda-11.8/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --use_fast_math -g --generate-code=arch=compute_52,code=[compute_52,sm_52] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/KMeansParallel.dir/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/KMeansParallel.dir/Point.cpp.o CMakeFiles/KMeansParallel.dir/Cluster.cpp.o CMakeFiles/KMeansParallel.dir/SequentialKMeans.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/KMeansParallel.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda-11.8/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-11.8/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
